original_text: For they have made ready their heart like an oven, whiles they lie in wait: their baker sleepeth all the night; in the morning it burneth as a flaming fire.
korean_text: 그들이 가까이 올 때에 그들의 마음은 간교하여 화덕 같으니 그들의 분노는 밤새도록 자고 아침에 피우는 불꽃 같도다

sentences.original_text: For they have made ready their heart like an oven
their baker sleepeth all the night
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 빵굽는 자는 밤새 잠을 자고

sentences.original_text: in the morning it burneth as a flaming fire
